page.title: 15THE PARISH CHURCH,CROSSENS
page.content: THE PARISH CHURCH IN CROSSENS IS ST. JOHN'S.THERE ARE SERVICES OF HOLY COMMUNION,PARISH EUCHARIST AND EVENSONG EACH SUNDAY,WITH A MIDWEEK COMMUNION. THERE IS A ST.JOHN'S GUILD WHICH MEETS EACH THURSDAY IN THE WINTER MONTHS. ST.JOHN'S ALSO HAS A YOUNG WIVES GROUP WHICH MEETS TWICE MONTHLY.THIS GROUP ORGANISE A CRECHE FOR INFANTS DURING FAMILY EUCHARIST TO FREE PARENTS AT THAT TIME. A PLAYGROUP MEETS FOUR TIMES A WEEK IN MORNINGS AND AFTERNOONS. OTHER COMMUNITY GROUPS INCLUDE THE CUBS SCOUTS,BROWNIES AND GUIDES.THESE MEET ON TUESDAYS AND THURSDAYS AT THE PARISH CENTRE.THEY ALSO GIVE A CHURCH PARADE ON THE FIRST SUNDAY OF EVERY MONTH. THE SUNDAY SCHOOL MEET AT THE FAMILY EUCHARIST AND HAVE THEIR LESSONS DURING THE SERVICE.
